meaningMnemonic: You keep your <radical>moon</radical> <radical>weapon</radical> in your <kanji>crotch</kanji>. Where else would you keep it?
readingMnemonic: Your <kanji>crotch</kanji> has a moon weapon, and it's served you well, so you hope that if you have a <reading>子 </reading> (こ) one day, they'll have one too.
